exceptions.exn: The LHS of RInt_val_comp_opp (RInt_val (fun x : R => _ (- x)) _ _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of RInt_val_swap (RInt_val _ _ _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: unfold scal, RInt_val. rewrite RInt_val_comp_opp. rewrite RInt_val_swap. unfold scal. rewrite prod_scal. simpl. rewrite <- RInt_val_ext with (f := fun x => f (u * x + v)) (g := fun x => f (u * x + v)) (a := u * a + v) (b := u * b + v). intros x Hx. f_equal. ring.
